title: The Aurora Shooter: Interview with Dr. Lynne Fenton
description:
In the second half of this two-parter, former FBI agent and criminal profiler, Candice DeLong interviews Dr. Lynne Fenton, the psychiatrist that treated James Holmes before his massacre at an Aurora, Colorado movie theater in 2012.


Listen to new episodes 1 week early and to all episodes ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. https://wondery.app.link/killerpsyche


Please support us by supporting our sponsors!
